author: Little Chinese Everywhere
description:
We're finally back in China after our Central Asia trip, and after a much-needed rest we’re exploring what might just be China’s most beautiful and green city: Hangzhou.
Hangzhou, the capital of Zhejiang province, is famous for its stunning West Lake, lush Longjing Tea Fields, and a perfect blend of nature and city life. In this video, we take you along as we wander through Hangzhou’s vibrant streets, peaceful lakeside paths, and scenic tea gardens right next to the city center.
Join us on this adventure and discover why Hangzhou is considered one of the most picturesque cities in all of China! 🌿🇨🇳

0:00 Intro
1:41 Hangzhou Historical City
9:30 Our Website
10:30 City Market
16:40 West Lake and Tea Gardens 

#china #hangzhou #chinese #travel #chinatravel
